definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: We're becoming, in a word, shallower.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在变得，用一个词就是，浅薄。

sentences.english: Their lives willbe stressful, unhappy and shallow。
sentences.chinese: 他们的生活会很紧张，不开心并且很浅薄。

sentences.english: In their opinions, people who change their jobs frequently are superficial and tactless .
sentences.chinese: 他们看来，经常更换职业的人浅薄，不老练。

sentences.english: Popular poems are not necessarily vulgar and shallow.
sentences.chinese: 并非意味着它是卑俗和浅薄的。

sentences.english: He was going to expose their triviality once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 他将彻底暴露他们的浅薄无能。

sentences.english: The bounder's ostentatious life showed his inanition .
sentences.chinese: 暴发户摆阔的生活方式显示出他的浅薄。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, words are, as a rule, the shallowest portion of all the argument.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，在一切雄辩中，语言往往是最浅薄的部分。

sentences.english: But his analysis is too shallow.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的分析太浅薄了。
浅薄无聊和朴素知足的真正价值。

sentences.english: Meanings of happiness won’t so flimsy.
sentences.chinese: 幸福的含义怎能那么浅薄？

sentences.english: Plough layer is thin with much hindering elements.
sentences.chinese: 耕层浅薄，障碍因素较多。

sentences.english: The pettiness, the shallowness, the emptiness of all this.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些的，渺小，浅薄，空洞。

sentences.english: He has very limited knowledge. He can't understand what hoopoo means.
sentences.chinese: 浅薄，不能理解呼呼哱是什么意思。

sentences.english: The same superficiality is found in nearly all kinds of business.
sentences.chinese: 类似的浅薄差不多可以在所有行业发现。

sentences.english: Is the affection between person and person so dilettante really?
sentences.chinese: 人和人之间的情感真的这么浅薄么？

definition: (humble expr.) of humble talent and shallow learning (idiom); Pray forgive my ignorance,...
